#labels dependecies,installation,howto
= Introduction =
py-iolsucker needs certain dependecies that must be installed for it to work. Instead of installing them at /lib I prefered installing libs in my home dir. Here I explain how I do it.

= Dependecies =
 * PyRSS2Gen
 * Beautiful Soup


= Howto install @ /home/ =

== Download ==
 * [http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/ Beautiful Soup]
 * [http://www.dalkescientific.com/Python/PyRSS2Gen.html PyRSS2Gen]

== Installation ==
 * Extract files.
 * python setup.py install --home=~

== Usage ==
Open a terminal and type:
{{{
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/home/your_user/lib/python/
}}}
Enjoy!
